name: Ski Jump Champs
description:
Perform a perfect jump in this special edition of Flick Champions Winter Sport!
This one will allow you to call the world-best jumpers onto The Great Rafter and challenge them all! Will it be you outjumping them??


FEATURES:
► INSTANT PICK-UP AND PLAY, with easy to master controls
► Real-time, cross-platform ski jumping competition!
► Individual or 2-Player mode
► Unique graphics style
► Global Ranking of the best (and worst!) Ski Jumpers
► Lightweight, smooth and User-friendly


Stay tuned for more online multiplayer sporting events, powered by Flick Champions ™!
